data.title: Steve Case - National Advisory Council on Innovation and Entrepreneurship (NACIE) Board (2014-16)
data.text:
National Advisory Council on Innovation and Entrepreneurship (NACIE) Board (2014-16)

Steve Case

Chairman, CEO Revolution

Revolutionâs mission is to invest in and mentor high-growth startups focused on disruptive consumer products. Steveâs entrepreneurial career began in 1985 when he co-founded America Online (AOL). Under Steveâs leadership, AOL became the worldâs largest and most valuable Internet company. Steve is also Chairman of the Case Foundation, which he established with his wife Jean in 1997. Together the Cases have invested in hundreds of organizations, initiatives and partnerships with a focus on leveraging the Internet and entrepreneurial approaches to strengthen the social sector. He was also the founding chair of the Startup America Partnership.
